title: Oscars 2017: The Best Memes - Vogue
text: The Best Memes of the 2017 Oscars February 27, 2017 4:02 AM by Madeleine Luckel Photo: Getty Images What are the best memes of the 2017 Oscars ? This is a very, very, important question. Why? Yes, we know you may already be very well aware of tonight's best tweets and gifs . But memes often make up the best part of any awards show, and the 89th Academy Awards is certainly no exception. Meryl Streep and Viola Davis's tete-a-tete inspired one idea of who the two women's respective alter egos might be, while The Rock's appearance as a presenter warranted its own moment to bask in world wide web's sun. Janelle Monáe's lipgloss reapplication said that she had already won, while Ryan Gosling's La La Land role provided some additional material of its own. But did one Moonlight meme in particular best encapsulated the direction of the show? Who knows. But one thing's for sure, time will tell. Below, the best memes of the 2017 Oscars.
